attributes.name: [MicrosoftSQL Server] Memory Grants Pending above threshold

esqlQuery.esql:
// The recommended threshold value for memory_grants_pending is > 0, and the alerting rule is grouped by Server Name. You can adjust the threshold value by modifying the memory_grants_pending in the WHERE clause 
 FROM metrics-microsoft_sqlserver.performance-default
| STATS memory_grants_pending=MAX(mssql.metrics.memory_grants_pending) by mssql.metrics.server_name
| WHERE memory_grants_pending > 0
